title: Where can I buy Loona albums? - Quora

response.answer_text: There are many places to buy LOONA albums. You can buy them from your local kpop album store, target, or amazon. Try to buy one that is unopened and not previously owned from preferably target (in-store, not online) because the shipment fee might be expensive and the actual solo and duo albums are normally not that expensive, especially when but in-store in TARGET. Local kpop album stores may bump up the price on the solo and subunit albums ESPECIALLY. If you’re looking for full group albums they will most likely be available in Target. If you can’t buy them in store shop online at target or amazon from the official LOONA store (it’ll mention the account somewhere). Do NOT buy from anywhere that’s NOT those 3 places, you may get scammed and the money and sales won’t go to LOONA and their company. There are also other trusted kpop album websites like Choice Music LA, and more, but PLEASE do your research before purchasing or else you may get scammed.

If you are looking for more options, Twitter and Tumblr should be a last resort. Even without an account, you can search “selling loona albums,” and someone may be selling their extras. They should give you the photocard(s) as well. Obviously, someone with Loona as their primary group will probably have more albums to sell off. Be careful though, you have to verify that you can trust them first.
